snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a discussion of who has applied for what new top level domain names and a comparison of the mobile application...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a discussion of who has applied for what new top level domain names and a comparison of the mobile application industry with the song writers of the early 1900s.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Domain Names and App Makers
